name: Elfie
description:
In this short visual novel you follow Elfie on her way home, together with her best friend Abelone.

This was created throughout a weekend and is pretty short. It was written in deep depression. Please read through the trigger warnings below carefully.

Features: 

-A cute artstyle

-Around 2500 words

-Poetry

TW: religious trauma, homophia, suicide.

Take care of yourselves out there.
